name: City Destroyer (Galaeth Games)
description:
Here's a little prototype of a game I made.

Control the robot and try and destroy the city, the soldiers (green blobs), tanks and helicopter will try to stop you.  I may return to this one day if there's enough interest.

Controls

MOVE: Arrow Keys / AWSD / D-Pad / Joystick
LASER: Control / Xbox Gamepad A button

Why not try my latest game:
Supermarket Duck Dash
